title: Eastbound and westbound services slightly delayed between Boon Lay and Joo Koon due to track fault.

title_translations.zh-Hans: 由于轨道故障，东行和西行列车在文礼站和裕廊西站之间发生轻微延误。
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan timur dan barat sedikit tertunda antara Boon Lay dan Joo Koon kerana kerosakan landasan.
title_translations.ta: Boon Lay மற்றும் Joo Koon இடையே கிழக்கு மற்றும் மேற்குbound சேவைகள் தட கோளாறு காரணமாக சற்று தாமதமாகின்றன.

updates.text: Fault has cleared.  Service on all lines are good but please allow extra time for travel due to wet tracks.
Eastbound services and westbound services between Boon Lay and Joo Koon are slightly delayed due track fault.
